    • Uses of CombiningAlgorithm in com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std.combiners

      Classes in com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std.combiners that implement CombiningAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CombiningAlgorithmBase<T extends Evaluatable> 
      class  DenyOverrides<T extends Evaluatable>
      DenyOverrides implements the XACML 3.0 "deny-overrides" combining algorithm for both policies and rules.
      class  DenyUnlessPermit<T extends Evaluatable>
      DenyUnlessPermit implements the XACML 3.0 "deny-unless-permit" combining algorithm for both policies and rules.
      class  FirstApplicable<T extends Evaluatable>
      PermitOverrides extends CombiningAlgorithmBase to implement the XACML 1.0 "first-applicable" combining algorithm for policies and rules.
      class  LegacyDenyOverridesPolicy
      DenyOverrides implements the XACML 1.0 "deny-overrides" combining algorithm for policies and policy sets.
      class  LegacyDenyOverridesRule
      DenyOverrides implements the XACML 1.0 "deny-overrides" combining algorithm for rules.
      class  LegacyPermitOverridesPolicy
      LegacyPermitOverridesPolicy extends com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.combiners.CombiningAlgorithmBase for PolicySetChild elements implementing the XACML 1.0 permit-overrides policy combining algorithm.
      class  LegacyPermitOverridesRule
      LegacyPermitOverridesRule extends com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.combiners.CombiningAlgorithmBase for Rules to implement the XACML 1.0 permit-overrides rule combining algorithm.
      class  OnlyOneApplicable
      OnlyOneApplicable extends CombiningAlgorithmBase to implement the XACML 1.0 "only-one-applicable" combining algorithm for policies and rules.
      class  PermitOverrides<T extends Evaluatable>
      PermitOverrides extends CombiningAlgorithmBase to implement the XACML 3.0 Permit-overrides combining algorithm for policies and rules.
      class  PermitUnlessDeny<T extends Evaluatable>
      PermitUnlessDeny implements the XACML 3.0 "permit-unless-deny" combining algorithm for both policies and rules.
